articles.content: Malaysia's Air Pollutant Index (API) recorded eight readings above 100 as at Monday (July 21) morning. According to the National Environment Agency (NEA), dry conditions were observed over most parts of the southern Asean region overnight, while wet...

articles.content: Wang joined the victimâ€™s group, which would gather at the Timezone in ION Orchard to play. The victim thus continuously received one-time passwords (OTPs), leading him to become uneasy. He called the police afterwards. On 8 Sept 2024, the victim confronted Wang about the OTPs at the Timezone arcade
